reviews.review_msg: hasn't returned marks for a month... had no idea how i was actually doing in the class until grades got posted (today). the whole course is reading hours worth of material and group discussions/projects. there is no actual contribution from her at all. marked discussions harshly. boring class overall.

The class has no lectures, just long readings and random videos that are very boring and abstract, the concepts are in no way connected together. There's insanely difficult weekly quizzes that ask about specific details in  readings which you couldn't possibly remember. Most the grade is based on group assignments and half my group didn't respond.

I took HSCI 199 with Kate, and there was no communication, no structure, and it was incredibly confusing. You lose marks for following the rubric and randomly lose 10% of your grade at the end of the semester. Thoroughly disappointing and a total regret.
She didn't really teach the course. Journal articles and random website links did. Her email response time was extremely slow as well.
